p.k: A two-part documentary, narrated by Dee Dee Bridgwater. "Part 2: From Highlife to Musette on the road where European and African music converge," we discover the diverse influences of Jazz and her offshoots that exist today
p.d: A two-part documentary, narrated by Dee Dee Bridgwater. Part 2: From Highlife to Musette On the road where European and African music converge, we discover the diverse influences of Jazz and her offshoots that exist today. New styles and revivals of past traditions enrich Jazz and render it the essential element of our entire music culture.
